metadata.title: CVE-2012-0219

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for x86
SUSE Linux Enterprise Teradata 10 SP3 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T

metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the xioscan_readline function in xio-readline.c in socat 1.4.0.0 through 1.7.2.0 and 2.0.0-b1 through 2.0.0-b4 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via the READLINE address.
